main.name: Igor Muntoreanu
main.description: ABAP Developer since 2010 with experience in various modules
main.bio: My name is Igor, I'm a SAP Fullstack Developer with 10+ years of experience. Currently I'm working in Germany by eXXcellent GmbH
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

resume.skillmessage: SAP Fiori Elements, OData, Gateway, HANA CDS Views, BOPF, SAP UI5, Web UI, BSP, BOL, Web Dynpro, IDOC inbound and outbound, ALV Grid/List/Tree/OO, ABAP OO, Module Pools, Function Modules, Badis, Bapis, Batch Inputs, User/Customer/Field/Screen-Exits, Enhancements, Interfaces, Macros, HR Payroll Exits, SAP Script, Smart forms, SOLMAN, SAP Performance Tuning, etc.

education.school: Faculdade de Informática e Administração Paulista - FIAP
Faculdade de Tecnologia de São Paulo - FATEC-SP

work.title: SAP Architect
work.description: Working mainly with SAP CRM and OData Services in Gateway as a technical developer

work.title: SAP Consultant
work.description: Worked as a technical developer with the SAP CRM, MM and SD modules

work.title: SAP Software Engineering
work.description: Worked as a technical developer in many Projects and SAP Modules

projects.title: Porsche
projects.category: Working as SAP Architect, building OData services to bring data from the CRM to the new Apps made in AngularJS. Some process examples: Business Partner, Vehicles, Data Privacy and Work List

projects.title: Deutsche Telekom: One ERP, Ebanf and ZMKM
projects.category: One ERP: SAP ABAP Consultant focused in the SD/MM module and IDOC interfaces for inbound Sales Order, Debitors and Creditors creation. Ebanf: ABAP Consultant focused in Web Dynpro development for a central portal(SD and MM Modules). [...]

projects.title: BRF WMS and TMS
projects.category: SAP WM module implementation. Performed activities: programs for collectors machine to BRF factories[...]

projects.title: Cordillera Latin America
projects.category: SAP ABAP Developer for lots of different processes like Warehouse and Transportation, Order-to-Cash, FI/CO, Make (PM and QM) and Source(MM). I have worked with interfaces, IDOCs, reports, Forms, Customer Exits, Pricing Formulas, Bank Interfaces, etc. Implementation of and IDOC Inbound for Sales Order Process.

projects.title: Bacardi
projects.category: First Bacardi SAP implementation in Brazil, development of interfaces running with IDOCs and PI/PO. Mostly we took care of the VA for SD and developed an inbound IDOC to create sales order in the system.

projects.title: Bunge
projects.category: SAP Technical Leader in Recife – BR and Technical designer developer. Most of the developments were made for the SD module.

projects.title: Dreyfus
projects.category: SAP Workflow development for VA01/VA02 to approve the Sales and the discounts.

projects.title: Natura Manter
projects.category: Implementation and Improvements of ABAP solutions (PP,MM,WM,QM,SD,HR, FI and APO SAP modules) for Brazil and Mexico.

projects.title: Multi-Clients Cell
projects.category: This was the first project where I made the intern ABAP academy and then help within several projects inside the Multi Cell department.

testimonials.text: Igor has excellent developer skills, such as logical thinking and design and pro activity[...]
Igor é um profissional extremamente habilidoso e auto didata no que faz. Não mede esforços para os estudos e em se capacitar para entregar sempre resultados espetaculares[...]
